column2: they were out of pork and beef ribs
column3: so we had to settle for the sausage and the brisket. We ordered a brisket sandwich
column4: a 2 meat dinner plate (with some brisket + sausage
column5: and a few extra sides: elotes
column7: potato salad). WOWOWOW. It all hit the mark! The meat was tender
column8: everything was well smoked & flavored and the service was great! Would recommend! (It's also open later than it's other Texas BBQ competitors!!!)
